grid.sql:
SELECT qry.rekv_id, qry.asutus_id, qry.konto, l.nimetus, qry.saldo, a.regkood, a.nimetus AS asutus, a.tp, a.aadress, ltrim(rtrim(r.nimetus))::VARCHAR(254) AS rekv_nimetus FROM docs.kontosaldoandmik($1::TEXT, $2::INTEGER, $3::DATE, $4::INTEGER, $5::INTEGER, $6::jsonb) qry INNER JOIN libs.asutus a ON a.id = qry.asutus_id INNER JOIN com_kontoplaan l ON ltrim(rtrim(l.kood)) = ltrim(rtrim(qry.konto)) INNER JOIN (SELECT id, parentid, regkood, nimetus FROM ou.rekv WHERE parentid < 999 UNION ALL SELECT 999999, 0, '' AS regkood, 'Kond' AS nimetus) r ON r.id = qry.rekv_id
WHERE qry.saldo <> 0 ORDER BY r.parentid, r.id DESC, qry.konto, a.nimetus
